channel.title: Cloudbase LABS
channel.description: We are bringing OpenStack to the classroom and as part of our effort we will teach, mentor and assist a group of 15 students.

item.title: Cloudbase LABS applications are open!
item.description: The applications for Cloudbase LABS are now open in Ia»ôi. If you are a student, apply until January 23 for a chance to attend a two week Python and DevOps workshop held by our colleagues from the Cloudbase team.
